cell2d

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • cell2d.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object

    The Assets class stores references to Filters, Sprites, SpriteSheets, Animations, Sounds, and Music tracks under String names that are unique among each of those types of assets. Assets must be added to the Assets class manually, such as in a CellGame's initActions(), after which they can be accessed at any time.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static final boolean add(java.lang.String name,
                                Filter filter)
        Adds the specified Filter to the list of Filters under the specified name. This method will do nothing if a Filter has already been added under that name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name under which the specified Filter is to be added
        filter - The Filter to be added to the list of Filters
        Returns:
        Whether the addition occurred
